title: LR51
author: Let Us All Rejoice
snippet: Be my protector, O God, a mighty stronghold to save me. For you are my rock, my stronghold! Lead me, guid me, for the sake of your name.

title: Psalm 119
author: Francesca LaRosa
snippet: Blessed are they who follow the law of the Lord!

title: Matthew 11:25
author: SP2026
snippet: Blessed are you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth; You have revealed to title ones the mysteries of the kingdom.

title: Drawn to You
author: Sarah Hart
snippet: Drawn to you, Lord, we are drawn to you, to the beauty of your presence in this place. Here for you, God, we are here for you as the gifts we bring become a feast of grace. We are drawn to you.

title: LR53
author: Let Us All Rejoice
snippet: God so loved the world that he gave his Only Begotten Son, so that all who believe in him may not perish, but may have eternal life.

title: Ubi Caritas
author: Bob Hurd
snippet: The love of Christ joins us together. Let us rejoice in him, and in our love and care for all now love God in return.

title: Blessed Are You (Psalm 146)
author: SUNO/Jim Ngo
snippet: Come, you weary, find your rest, Here the broken, truly blessed. Lay your burdens, take His peace, In His love, sorrows cease.

title: Walk in Love
author: Suno/Jim Ngo
snippet: Walk in love, hand in hand, Every heart, every friend. No walls between, no lines to defend, One family, without end.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Lord, have mercy. Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: When we eat this bread and drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
